name: Beiten Burkhardt
goal:
In Brussels we handle all issues arising from doing business in the European Union. Legal lobbying is very much part of our services and we have initiated numerous amendments to EU law to the benefit of our clients.
We advise our international clients in French, German, English, Dutch, Mandarin and Russian.
We counsel on cartels and merger control and draft compliance programmes and early warning systems with which business models, products and the group strategy can be adapted preventively. We form cross-border joint ventures and distribution contracts, examine award proceedings and anti-dumping regulations, assist with state aids and draft position papers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Culture and media, Customs, Energy, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
